name: Bowerwhelm
description:
Bowerwhelm is an FPS Rogue-lite game where you face hordes of never-ending balls. Don’t let the word “ball” fool you, they will HURT you. Prepare yourself!

Survive!

Your reflexes alone won’t save you. You will need to choose your skills wisely throughout the game or you will get BOWERWHELMED!

Build Your Deck

You will have the opportunity to create a powerful deck of skills that can be combined for maximum impact. With a wide variety of skills available, you'll have the chance to experiment with different combinations to find the perfect strategy for your play style.


Starting Tips:

  • Take your time to collect capsules. Don’t hurry they won’t disappear
  • Check your quests to unlock new skills
  • Don’t forget to evolve your skills
  • Buy permanent upgrades to start stronger
  • Finally, kill balls before they touch you!
